trans-unit.source: Allows you to override attributes applied to properties, fields, and classes when you use an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to serialize or deserialize an object as encoded SOAP.
trans-unit.target: Permite que você substitua os atributos aplicados às propriedades, campos e classes de quando você usa um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>serializar ou desserializar um objeto como codificada em SOAP.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The SoapAttributeOverrides class enables an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to override the default way of serializing a set of objects.
trans-unit.target: Os SoapAttributeOverrides classe permite que um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>para substituir a forma padrão de serializar um conjunto de objetos.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Overriding serialization in this way has two uses: first, you can control and augment the serialization of objects found in a DLL, even if you do not have access to the source; second, you can create one set of serializable classes, but serialize the objects in multiple ways.
trans-unit.target: Substituir a serialização dessa maneira tem dois usos: primeiro, você pode controlar e aumentar a serialização de objetos encontrados em uma DLL, mesmo se você não tiver acesso à fonte de; em seguida, você pode criar um conjunto de classes serializáveis, mas serializar os objetos de várias maneiras.

trans-unit.source: For example, instead of serializing members of a class instance as XML elements, you can serialize them as XML attributes, resulting in a more efficient document to transport.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, em vez de serialização de membros de uma instância da classe como elementos XML, você pode serializá-los como atributos XML, resultando em um documento mais eficiente de transporte.

trans-unit.source: After you create a SoapAttributeOverrides, you create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> class.
trans-unit.target: Depois de criar um SoapAttributeOverrides, crie um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>usando o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A>método de <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter>classe.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>

trans-unit.source: Pass the resulting object as an argument to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Passe o objeto resultante como um argumento para o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> uses the data contained by the SoapAttributeOverrides to override attributes that control how objects are serialized.
trans-unit.target: Resultante <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>usa os dados contidos pelo SoapAttributeOverrides para substituir os atributos que controlam como os objetos são serializados.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: To accomplish this, the SoapAttributeOverrides contains a collection of the object types that are overridden, as well as a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> associated with each overridden object type.
trans-unit.target: Para fazer isso, o SoapAttributeOverrides contém uma coleção de tipos de objeto são substituídos, bem como um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>associados a cada tipo de objeto substituído.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contains an appropriate set of attribute objects that control how each field, property, or class is serialized.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>contém um conjunto apropriado de objetos de atributos que controlam como cada campo, propriedade ou classe é serializado.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: The process for creating and using a SoapAttributeOverrides is as follows: 1.
trans-unit.target: O processo para criar e usar um SoapAttributeOverrides é o seguinte: 1.

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>.
trans-unit.target: Criar um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Create an attribute object that is appropriate to the object being overridden.
trans-unit.target: Crie um objeto de atributo que é apropriado para o objeto que está sendo substituído.

trans-unit.source: For example, to override a field or property, create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>, using the new, derived type.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para substituir um campo ou propriedade, crie um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>, usando o novo tipo derivado.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>

trans-unit.source: You can optionally assign a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute.ElementName%2A> that overrides the base class's attribute name or namespace.
trans-unit.target: Opcionalmente, você pode atribuir um novo <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute.ElementName%2A>que substitui o namespace ou nome de atributo da classe base.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute.ElementName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Add the attribute object to the appropriate <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> property or collection.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar o objeto de atributo ao apropriado <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>propriedade ou coleção.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, you would set the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapElement%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> object to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> and specify the member name that is being overridden.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você poderia definir o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapElement%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>do objeto para o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>e especifique o nome do membro que está sendo substituído.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapElement%2A>

trans-unit.source: Create a SoapAttributeOverrides.
trans-unit.target: Crie um SoapAttributeOverrides.

trans-unit.source: Add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to the SoapAttributeOverrides using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>ao SoapAttributeOverrides usando o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides.Add%2A>método.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: If the object being overridden is a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>, you need only specify the type of the overridden object.
trans-unit.target: Se o objeto que está sendo substituído for um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>, você precisa apenas especificar o tipo do objeto substituído.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: But if you are overriding a field or property, you must also specify the name of the overridden member.
trans-unit.target: Mas se você está substituindo um campo ou propriedade, você também deve especificar o nome do membro substituído.

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> class.
trans-unit.target: Criar um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>usando o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A>método de <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter>classe.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>

trans-unit.source: When constructing the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>, pass the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Ao construir o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>, passar o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>para o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Use the resulting <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to serialize or deserialize the class objects.
trans-unit.target: Use resultante <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>para serializar ou desserializar os objetos de classe.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> to a collection of <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref> em uma coleção de <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The type parameter specifies an object to be overridden by the .
trans-unit.target: O type parâmetro especifica um objeto a ser substituído pelo .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contains a union of attribute objects that cause the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to override its default serialization behavior for a set of objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>contém uma união de objetos de atributos que fazem com que o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>para substituir o comportamento de serialização padrão para um conjunto de objetos.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: You choose the attribute objects to place in the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, depending on the particular behaviors you want to override.
trans-unit.target: Escolha os objetos de atributo para colocar no <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, dependendo dos comportamentos específicos que você deseja substituir.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes a class member as an XML element by default.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>serializa um membro de classe como um elemento XML por padrão.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: If you want the member to be serialized as an XML attribute instead, you would create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, assign it to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> property of a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, and add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: Se desejar que o membro a ser serializado como um atributo XML em vez disso, você deve criar um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, atribuí-la para o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A>propriedade de um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>e adicione <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Use the Add method to add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: Use o método Add para adicionar o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to add a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> that contains a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Use essa sobrecarga para adicionar uma <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>que contém <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> overrides the serialization of a class, you need not specify a member of the class to override, only the type of the class.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>substitui a serialização de uma classe, não é necessário especificar um membro da classe para substituir, apenas o tipo de classe.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the object that is overridden.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do objeto que será substituído.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> that represents the overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref> que representa os atributos de substituição.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> to the collection of <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> objects contained by the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref> à coleção de <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref> objetos contidos pelo <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The type parameter specifies the object to be overridden by the .
trans-unit.target: O type parâmetro especifica o objeto a ser substituído pelo .

trans-unit.source: The member parameter specifies the name of a member that is overridden.
trans-unit.target: O member parâmetro especifica o nome de um membro que é substituído.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contains a union of attribute objects that cause the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to override its default serialization behavior for a set of objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>contém uma união de objetos de atributos que fazem com que o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>para substituir o comportamento de serialização padrão para um conjunto de objetos.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: You choose the attribute objects to place in the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, depending on the particular behaviors you want to override.
trans-unit.target: Escolha os objetos de atributo para colocar no <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, dependendo dos comportamentos específicos que você deseja substituir.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes a class member as an XML element by default.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>serializa um membro de classe como um elemento XML por padrão.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: If you want the member to be serialized as a SOAP attribute instead, you would create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, assign it to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> property of a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, and add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: Se desejar que o membro a ser serializado como um atributo SOAP em vez disso, você deve criar um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, atribuí-la para o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A>propriedade de um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>e adicione <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> method to add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Add%2A>método para adicionar o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use this method when the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contains either a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute><xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>, or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método quando o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>contém um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute><xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>, ou <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute></xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the object to override.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do objeto para substituir.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The name of the member to override.
trans-unit.target: O nome do membro para substituir.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> that represents the overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref> que representa os atributos de substituição.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object associated with the specified (base class) type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto associado ao tipo especificado (classe base).

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to return a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> that contains attributes for a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Use essa sobrecarga para retornar uma <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>que contém atributos para <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: The base class <xref:System.Type> that is associated with the collection of attributes you want to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: A classe base <xref:System.Type>que está associado com a coleção de atributos que você deseja recuperar.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> that represents the collection of overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref> que representa a coleção de atributos de substituição.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object associated with the specified (base class) type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto associado ao tipo especificado (classe base).

trans-unit.source: The member parameter specifies the base class member that is overridden.
trans-unit.target: O member parâmetro especifica o membro da classe base que é substituído.

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to return a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> that contains attributes that override a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute>, or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Use essa sobrecarga para retornar um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>que contém atributos que substituem uma <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute>, ou <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: You can also return a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> that contains the override of a default value that uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode retornar uma <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>que contém a substituição de um valor padrão que usa um <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contains a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>, you must use the overload that specifies only the overridden type.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>contém um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>, você deve usar a sobrecarga que especifica apenas o tipo de substituição.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: The base class <xref:System.Type> that is associated with the collection of attributes you want to override.
trans-unit.target: A classe base <xref:System.Type>que está associado com a coleção de atributos que você deseja substituir.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The name of the overridden member that specifies the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> to return.
trans-unit.target: O nome do membro substituído que especifica o <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref> para retornar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> that represents the collection of overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref> que representa a coleção de atributos de substituição.
